text: You strike the lower regions with a resounding <SWORD_SOUNDS>
<SWORD_SOUNDS> You attack the center of mass!
Weaving you slam into your target, <SWORD_SOUNDS>
Feinting high <SWORD_SOUNDS> You visciously smash the midsection.
With a half spin you coil your energy and unleash it with a twist of the hips <SWORD_SOUNDS>
You spread out low to the ground, your chest nearly touching the floor only to suddenly whip up <SWORD_SOUNDS>
<SWORD_SOUNDS> You dodge midair with your legs spread apart while you strike downwards!
